Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires entities that submit records to state agencies that are excepted from disclosure under FOIL to periodically re-apply for the exception
Summary: Requires entities that submit records to state agencies that are excepted from disclosure under FOIL to periodically re-apply for the exception.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring entities that submit records to state agencies that are excepted from disclosure under the freedom of information law to periodically re-apply for the exception
